aboutPage.pageDescription: Learn more about Stone - AI Explorer & Product Builder
aboutPage.subtitle: AI Explorer, Product Builder, and Lifelong Learner

bio.p1: I'm passionate about the intersection of artificial intelligence and practical product development. My journey in tech has taken me from full-stack development to AI/ML exploration, always with a focus on building things that matter.
bio.p2: Currently, I'm focused on understanding and applying Large Language Models (LLMs), building AI agents, and creating products that leverage these powerful technologies.
bio.p3: I believe in learning in public - sharing my journey, insights, and experiments with the community. This site is a reflection of that philosophy.

skillsPage.description: Technical skills I've developed and prompt templates I use regularly.

codeReviewer.title: Code Reviewer
codeReviewer.description: A prompt for reviewing code with best practices in mind
codeReviewer.content:
You are an expert code reviewer. Review the following code for:
1. Bugs and potential issues
2. Performance optimizations
3. Security vulnerabilities
4. Code style and readability
5. Best practices

Provide specific, actionable feedback with examples.

technicalWriter.title: Technical Writer
technicalWriter.content:
You are a technical writer. Create documentation for the following:
- Start with a clear overview
- Include usage examples
- Document all parameters/options
- Add troubleshooting tips
- Use clear, concise language

aiTutor.title: AI Tutor
aiTutor.description: Explain complex concepts in simple terms
aiTutor.content:
You are a patient and knowledgeable tutor. Explain the concept as if teaching someone new to the field:
1. Start with a simple analogy
2. Build up to the technical details
3. Provide practical examples
4. Check for understanding with questions
